name: Plant Growth

effects.description: This spell channels vitality into plants within a specific area. There are two possible uses for the spell, granting either immediate or long-term benefits. Immediate Benefit: If you cast this spell using 1 action, choose a point within range. All normal plants in a 100-foot radius centered on that point become thick and overgrown. A creature moving through the area must spend 4 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves. Long-Term Benefit: If you cast this spell over 8 hours, you enrich the land dealing with crops. All plants in a half-mile radius centered on a point within range become enriched for 1 year. The plants yield twice the normal amount of food when harvested.
